Name: FyreXR Festival
About the game: FYRE XR is a tropical Virtual Reality festival. All of the things that were promised on the original Fyre Festival can be experienced on this VR festival. We guarantee that the FYRE XR Festival will happen! Discover a world without limitations. Meet your friends and party with strangers in the Bahamas. Live music with custom lightshows for the real festival feeling. 8 stages with 75 performances of music, dance and theatre. Join us on 18, 19 & 20th of June â€™21. Hosts and hostesses will guide you so you can enjoy the party to the fullest!
